entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
